title: Dark chocolate tart with Turkish delight
description: A simple dark chocolate tart with rose-flavoured Turkish delight, plain and dipped in chocolate, on the side.
ingredients: 400g/14oz dark chocolate, 85 per cent cocoa solids, roughly chopped
3 tbsp icing sugar, plus extra for dusting
110g/4oz dark chocolate, 85 per cent cocoa solids, melted
